member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2
member.summary: Represents activation parameters for a spatial audio render stream, extending with the ability to specify stream options.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.ObjectFormat
member.summary: Format descriptor for spatial audio objects associated with the stream. All objects must have the same format and must be of type WAVEFORMATEX or WAVEFORMATEXTENSIBLE.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.StaticObjectTypeMask
member.summary: A bitwise combination of AudioObjectType values indicating the set of static spatial audio channels that will be allowed by the activated stream.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.MinDynamicObjectCount
member.summary: The minimum number of concurrent dynamic objects. If this number of dynamic audio objects can't be activated simultaneously, no dynamic audio objects will be activated.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.MaxDynamicObjectCount
member.summary: The maximum number of concurrent dynamic objects that can be activated with .

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.Category
member.summary: The category of the audio stream and its spatial audio objects.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.EventHandle
member.summary: The event that will signal the client to provide more audio data. This handle will be duplicated internally before it is used.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.NotifyObject
member.summary: The object that provides notifications for spatial audio clients to respond to changes in the state of an . This object is used to notify clients that the number of dynamic spatial audio objects that can be activated concurrently is about to change.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.DistanceDecay
member.summary: Optional default value for the decay model used for objects associated with the stream. nullptr if unused.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.Directivity
member.summary: Optional default value for the spatial audio directivity model used for objects associated with the stream. nullptr if unused.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.Environment
member.summary: Optional default value for the type of environment that is simulated when audio is processed for objects associated with the stream. nullptr if unused.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.Orientation
member.summary: Optional default value for the orientation of objects associated with the stream. nullptr if unused.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfActivationParams2.Options
member.summary: A member of the emumeration, specifying options for the activated audio stream.
